api_list.name: Hourly Forecast
api_list.description: Weather hourly forecast by zip code. Zip code needs to be supplied as a URL query parameter.

api_list.name: Weather Alerts
api_list.description: Weather alerts by area. area needs to be supplied as a URL query parameter in terms of a US state abbreviation  such as CA for California.

api_list.name: Daily Forecast
api_list.description: Weather daily forecast by zip code. Zip code needs to be supplied as a URL query parameter.
